general.title: Prompt Library
general.help-login: If you need support to solve your doubts or have technical problems, please send us an email.
general.save-error: An error occurred while saving the data. Please contact the administrator

prompts.title: Prompt List
prompts.delete-content:
If you delete this prompt, all traces of personal notes and generated posts associated with this prompt will be removed.

Are you sure you want to delete the prompt?
prompts.delete-problem: There was a problem with the deletion. You may not have permissions. Please contact the administrator.

edit-prompt.title: Title
edit-prompt.author: Author
edit-prompt.help-create: You can create posts manually        or import a prompt in JSON format
edit-prompt.delete-content:
If you delete this information section, the entered data in this section could be lost.

Are you sure you want to delete it?

import-prompt.title: Import Prompt
import-prompt.content:
From this screen, you will be able to import prompt information semi-automatically.

Currently, we only have import available from ChatGPT, but we are working to incorporate other services.
import-prompt.json-data-import: Paste here the content of the prompt in JSON format
import-prompt.fieldset-chatGPT-instructions:
To import a prompt from ChatGPT, follow these steps:
  • Access the ChatGPT website, by clicking here
  • Open your browser's developer console (in Chrome by pressing F12)
  • Open the 'Network' section and then click the 'Fetch/XHR' filter
  • Access the chat you want to import
  • Some requests will have appeared in the developer console. Look for and click on the one with a name consisting of random numbers and letters and has a path of '/backend-api/conversation/...'
  • Open the 'Response' tab which will contain the chat in Json format. Copy the text and paste it into the textarea above

errors.credentials: Incorrect credentials. Make sure you have entered the username (not the email) and the corporate password
errors.not-granted: The user does not have valid permissions in the application. Contact the administrator
errors.server-error: A server error has occurred. Please contact an administrator. We apologize for the inconvenience.
errors.not-processed: The sent item could not be processed
